definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: Maradona also praised Javier Zanetti for his reaction to losing the captaincy .
sentences.chinese: 馬拉多納同樣表揚了扎內蒂失去隊長袖標之後的反應。

sentences.english: Because the injured captain John Terry, Rio Ferdinand will continue to wear the captain armband.
sentences.chinese: 因爲隊長特里的受傷，費迪南德將繼續佩戴隊長袖標。

sentences.english: The manager gave me a big boost by giving me the armband.
sentences.chinese: 主教練把袖標給我對我是個很大的激勵。

sentences.english: I must have said it 20 or 30 times, pointing to my armband.
sentences.chinese: 我指着自己的袖標，將這句話說了不下二三十次。

sentences.english: The centre-half was also made captain for the night at the request of Stevie G.
sentences.chinese: 那晚這位中衛在傑拉德的要求下戴上的隊長袖標。

sentences.english: The captain arm-band was passed to Maldini.
sentences.chinese: 隊長袖標被交到了馬爾蒂尼的手上。
